question: The Child and Adolescent Labour (Prohibition and Regulation) Act was enacted in which year?
explanation: The Child and Adolescent Labour (Prohibition and Regulation) Act was passed by the Parliament of India in the year 1986. It was enacted on 23 December 1986 to prohibit private, government or semi-government companies, organizations, civil departments or child\'s family from employing a child or adolescents in any occupation or process.
